articles.author: Skylar Woodhouse
articles.title: Biden Issues Rare Presidential Apology Over Indian Boarding Schools - Bloomberg
articles.description: President Joe Biden apologized for the federal government’s role in running a system of Indian boarding schools that separated Native American children from their families and wreaked havoc on tribal communities.
